alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 8:34PM EDT until July 29 at 8:52PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 17.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.2 feet on 02/16/1949. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued 1 AM EDT early Friday morning.
